mapper.select: SELECT m.no, m.id, m.pW, m.name, m.regDate, m.moddate, a.auth FROM mybatisMember m Inner JOIN mybatismemberAuth a ON m.no = a.no WHERE m.no = #{no} and m.enabled = '1'
SELECT no, id, PW, name, regDate FROM mybatisMember m where m.enabled = '1' ORDER BY regDate DESC
mapper.delete: UPDATE mybatisMember m SET enabled = '0' WHERE NO = #{no} and m.enabled ='1'
mapper.insert:
select mybatismember_seq.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
